Temple of the Old Ones


Worship with fire and blood; worship with swords & with spears. Let the woman be girt with a sword before me: let blood flow to my name. Trample down the Heathen; be upon them o warrior, I will give you of their flesh to eat!

To Enter the Temple of the Old Ones you must first be a member of the Cult of the Dead. Should you wish to join and follow the teachings of the Old Ones, please link to the Cult of the Dead page for initiation.

Within the Temple walls members will learn and partake in:
  • Dark Prayer & Meditation
  • Ancient Spells & Magic
  • Rituals & Worship
  • The Old Ones
